timeline.bodyText: FYI: we need a s/lux/lumen/ in unitsTest.txt together with this change.
timeline.author: hugovdm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -236,8 +246,11 @@ For terms of use, see http://www.unicode.org/copyright.html
         <!-- acceleration -->
         <convertUnit source='g-force' baseUnit='meter-per-square-second' factor='gravity'/>
         
+        <!-- luminance -->
+        <convertUnit source='lux' baseUnit='candela-per-square-meter'/>
+
         <!-- luminous-flux -->
-        <convertUnit source='lux' baseUnit='candela-square-meter-per-square-meter'/>
+        <convertUnit source='lumen' baseUnit='candela-square-meter-per-square-meter'/>
